name: 404 Game Re:Set
storyline:
This is a world of SEGA, by SEGA, for SEGA

From infrastructure to entertainment, Sega reigns supreme in every field.

One day, a player living in such a world meets the mysterious existence "X".

"The world you live in is not right."

Players who know that this world has been distorted by Sega will throw themselves into the battle against Sega to restore the original world.
summary:
A new mobile game from Sega with Yoko Taro as Creative Director and Yuugen as Character Designer, previously worked on Heaven Burns Red and Atelier Sophie, planned for release in 2023.

The game features female characters based on Sega titles.
The announcement showed the characters based on Outrun, After Burner, Virtua Fighter and Virtua Fighter.
